sentences.english: Muira pauma Root - This is a shrub native to Brazil, and has a long history of use as an aphrodisiac.

sentences.english: It is the male seed of flowers, and is known as a fertility food.

sentences.english: The Chinese in Guangzhou eat tiger penis to boost sexual performance and stamina.

definition: to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
to cure constipation with laxatives
benefit/help
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
tonic
to enrich the blood
treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
to relieve fever
to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)
to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
conversant with the Confucian classics/to stimulate menstrual flow (TCM)
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to get it straight/to start to understand things properly/enlightenment dawns
food therapy/treatment via food (TCM)
tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
pharmacology
